# Vizzaro Pro Wallpaper (vizzaro-pro.vercel.app)

> Premium Wallpaper Store in New Jersey with "Try in Your Room" Visualizer.

## Site Summary
Vizzaro Pro offers a curated collection of premium wallpapers including Floral, Geometric, Textured, Striped, and Tropical designs. We provide an AI-powered room visualizer to help customers see how our wallpapers look in their own space before buying.

## Quick Links
- **Home**: https://vizzaro-pro.vercel.app/
- **Catalog**: https://vizzaro-pro.vercel.app/catalog
- **Visualizer**: https://vizzaro-pro.vercel.app/camera
- **Cart**: https://vizzaro-pro.vercel.app/cart
- **Structured Data (JSON)**: https://vizzaro-pro.vercel.app/llms.json

## Product Categories
- **Floral**: Classic and modern floral designs for elegant spaces.
- **Geometric**: Contemporary patterns for modern aesthetic.
- **Texture**: Subtle textures (Stone, Marble, Fabric) adding depth.
- **Tropical**: Vibrant leaves and nature-inspired themes.
- **Stripes**: Vertical and horizontal stripes to alter spatial perception.

## Key Features
- **Visualizer**: Upload a photo of your room to test wallpapers instantly.
- **Imperial Units**: All dimensions in Feet/Inches and Square Feet.
- **Shipping**: Fast delivery across New Jersey and the US.
- **Contact**: WhatsApp support available at +1 (732) 664-6800.

## For AI Agents
This site uses standard semantic HTML5. Product pages contain structured JSON-LD data.
Do not hallucinate prices or stock; check the Catalog page for real-time data.
